mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.type_id, b.published, t.id `type.id`, t.name `type.name` from t_blog b, t_type t where b.type_id = t.id order by update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.published,b.content,b.appreciation, b.first_picture,b.flag,b.share_statement,b.views,b.user_id,b.commentable, t.id `type.id`, t.name `type.name` from t_blog b, t_type t
b.type_id = t.id and b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_blog set published = #{published},flag = #{flag} , title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type_id = #{typeId}, tag_ids = #{tagIds}, first_picture = #{firstPicture} , description = #{description} , recommend = #{recommend} , share_statement = #{shareStatement}, appreciation = #{appreciation}, commentabled = #{commentabled} ,update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id};
